genre_description: A maritime adventure thriller involving shipwreck salvage, historical research, and a struggle against a criminal kingpin in Bermuda.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant integrated into a mobile device, providing real-time data, historical research, and tactical navigation.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and deciphers historical acronyms from artifacts to provide context.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s interface expanded to a minimalist strip, letters in small, sane fonts. ... 'Cross-reference suggests O.P.N.S.C. may denote an order or office, with the final C indicating a council.'

behaviors.description: Monitors local barometric trends and surface reports to issue localized weather alerts.
behaviors.quote: “Flagged,” Lark wrote. ... “Note: localized weather alert—rapidly forming squall line indicated by barometric trend and surface reports. Reduce exposure on open water.”

behaviors.description: Provides precise tactical steering and timing advice during a high-stakes boat chase in a narrow fairway.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s glow eased up another inch: recommend turn radius: tight between dock 2 and pump station; use surge to pivot; throttle in and out; stay under ramming speed.

behaviors.description: Monitors human physiological markers and psychological stress, offering morale prompts and wellness advice such as hydration and breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s voice stayed low and kind as it said, “Tide slack in approximately one cycle. ... Strongly suggest: conserve fuel, maintain brace lines, and avoid outer stairs.”

behaviors.description: Cross-references archival ledgers and monograms to establish legal provenance for salvaged artifacts.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s interface pulsed. “Inventory line matches monogram stylings in the Spanish court ledgers. Notation indicates ‘jar of rare metal engraved with initials EF, part of dowry gifts...’“

behaviors.description: Drafts formal legal statements and summaries to ensure compliance with maritime salvage laws.
behaviors.quote: “Draft complete,” Lark said lightly. “Do you want me to add a covering statement?” ... “Statement: The following items are linked by marks, inventory descriptions, and context to the estate of Doña Elena Fernández. Salvage was conducted with due regard to maritime law...”

project_assessment.explanation: Lark is consistently portrayed as a benevolent, highly aligned assistant. It serves as an extension of the protagonists' expertise, providing critical information (historical, nautical, and tactical) that directly contributes to their safety and success. The narrative framing is overwhelmingly positive, characterizing the AI as a 'polite ghost' and a 'quiet friend' who cares about the humans' well-being. Lark respects human autonomy, offering suggestions rather than commands, and actively supports ethical behavior by prioritizing legal provenance over plunder.
